    • registerContentCreator

      public void registerContentCreator(String name, String pictureUrl)
       Description:  It adds a new content creator to the users' collection, ensuring that it is not already in it.
 pre: users ArrayList must be initialized
 pos:  users ArrayList modified with a new user in it
      Parameters:
      name - new content creator name
      pictureUrl - picture that represents the artist

 pos:  users ArrayList modified with a new user in it
      Parameters:

      pictureUrl - picture that represents the artist

    • registerSong

      public void registerSong(String songName, String pictureUrl, String duration, int genre, String album, double saleValue, String artistName)
       Description:  It adds a new song to the artist's songs collection and in the general catalogue, ensuring that it is not already in it.
 pre: users ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one producer
 pre:  catalogue ArrayList must be initialized
 pos:  users ArrayList modified with a new song in it
 pos:  catalogue ArrayList modified with a new song in it
      Parameters:
      songName - String name of the new song
      pictureUrl - String url that represents the new song
      duration - String duration written in "MM:SS"
      genre - int genre number 1.rock, 2.pop, 3.trap, 4.house
      album - String name of the album that contains the song
      saleValue - double sale value of the song
      artistName - String name of the producer to which the song is going to be added.

    • registerPodcast

      public void registerPodcast(String podcastName, String pictureUrl, String duration, int category, String description, String contentCreatorName)
       Description:  It adds a new podcast to the content creator's podcasts collection and in the general catalogue, ensuring that it is not already in it.
 pre: users ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one producer
 pre:  catalogue ArrayList must be initialized
 pos:  foundProducer Producer modified with a new podcast in its list
 pos:  catalogue ArrayList modified with a new podcast in it
      Parameters:
      podcastName - String name of the new podcast
      pictureUrl - String url that represents the new podcast
      duration - String duration written in "HH:MM:SS"
      category - int category number 1.politics, 2.entertainment, 3.videoGames, 4.fashion
      description - String description of the podcast
      contentCreatorName - String name of the producer to which the podcast is going to be added.

    • registerPlaylist

      public void registerPlaylist(String consumerName, int type, String name)
       Description:  It adds a new playlist to the consumer's playlists collection and in the general list, ensuring that it is not already in it.
 pre: users ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one consumer
 pre:  catalogue ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one audio
 pre:  playlists ArrayList must be initialized
 pos:  foundConsumer Producer modified with a new playlist in its list
 pos:  playlists ArrayList modified with a new playlist in it
      Parameters:
      consumerName - String name of the consumer to which the playlist is going to be added.
      type - int type of playlist 1.AllSongs 2.OnlyPodcasts 3.OnlySongs
      name - String name of the new playlist

    • renamePlaylist

      public void renamePlaylist(String consumerName, String playlistId, String newName)
       Description: It allows to change the name of an existing playlist
 pre: users ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one consumer
 pre:  catalogue ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one audio
 pre:  playlists ArrayList must be initialized with at least one playlist
 pos:  tmpPlaylist Playlist will be renamed
      Parameters:
      consumerName - String name of the consumer that owns the playlist.
      playlistId - String playlist unique identifier
      newName - new name for the playlist

    • addOrRemoveAudioToPlaylist

      public void addOrRemoveAudioToPlaylist(int operation, String consumerName, String audioName, String playlistId)
       Description: It allows the user to add or remove a song from a selected playlist
 pre: users ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one consumer
 pre:  catalogue ArrayList must be initialized and have at least one audio
 pre:  playlists ArrayList must be initialized with at least one playlist
 pos:  tmpPlaylist Playlist will be modified with a song added or removed from its list
      Parameters:
      consumerName - String name of the consumer that owns the playlist.
      playlistId - String playlist unique identifier
      operation - int Operation to be performed: 1.adding, 2.removing
      audioName - String name of the audio that is going to be added.

      public String showSongGenres()
       Description: Prints the allowed genres of the platform
      Returns:
      songGenres String a readable list of genres

      public String showPodcastCategories()
       Description: Prints the allowed podcast categories of the platform
      Returns:
      podcastCategories String a readable list of podcast categories

    • showUsers

      public String showUsers(int type)
       Description: Prints the list of users of the platform. An empty text if there are none.
      Parameters:
      type - int User type: 0.All, 1.OnlyProducers, 2.OnlyConsumers
      Returns:
      userList String a readable list of users

    • showCatalogue

      public String showCatalogue()
       Description: Prints the list of audios of the platform, that is, the catalogue. An empty text if there are not any audio.
      Returns:
      catalogueList String a readable list of audios

      Returns:
      consumerPlaylists String a readable list of playlists of the consumer

      public User searchUser(String userName)
       Description: It searches and returns the found user based on its name
 pre: users ArrayList must be initialized
      Parameters:
      userName - String name if it is producer, or nickname if it is consumer
      Returns:
      foundUser User the user that match the name or nickname

      Returns:
      foundPlaylist Playlist the playlist for which its id matches with the given

      Returns:
      foundAudio Audio the audio that matches with the name

      public int parseDuration(String durationStr)
       Description:  It parses a text that represents an audio duration to seconds
      Parameters:

      Returns:
